topics.body:
Sometimes I wish we could filter single images in addition to entire tags

Like sometimes I really don't want to see a particular image, but there are no tags that I want to filter out that pertain to the image because they all contain stuff that I really do want to see

Or a tag pertains to something I don't care for, but one or two images in there stands out from the rest to make me like the single image
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body: Another thing I like about Tamers is how the tamers themselves are more active in battle. Even if it's just providing buffs it's still more proactive than ANYTHING Tai or anyone else did in Adventure.
